title: tiruvaDigaLai tozhudiDum
sahitya:
tiruvaDigaLai tozhudiDum enakku aruL purindiDum naTarAjanE un


anupallavi

  marupaDiyum immAnilam tanilE pirand-uzhalAmal ennaik-kAttiDum


caraNam    sirumaiyum varumaiyum ennai toDarAmal karattAl taDuttiDuvOnE
parivuDanE tam bhaktarkkuabhayam tarum dayALanE adhipanE
